metadata.title: CVE-2023-52642 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:rc: bpf attach/detach requires write permission Note that bpf attach/detachalso requires CAP_NET_ADMIN.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
